nodes.text: The Giju Run or the Giju Passage was a hyperspace route located along the border of the Core Worlds and the Colonies. The Giju Run ran past Giju, the Herglic homeworld, which was located on the Rimma Trade Route, into the Tapani sector, reaching its terminus at Tallaan, where it intersected with the Shapani Bypass and the Procopian Shipping Lane.
